dependencies.description:
d2to1 (the 'd' is for 'distutils') allows using distutils2-like
setup.cfg files for a package's metadata with a distribute/setuptools
setup.py script.
dependencies.name: py-d2to1

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
NFS-Ganesha is an NFSv3,v4,v4.1 fileserver that runs in user mode on
most UNIX/Linux systems. It also supports the 9p.2000L protocol.
dependent_to.name: nfs-ganesha

dependent_to.description:
pywcs is a set of routines for handling the FITS World Coordinate System
(WCS) standard.
dependent_to.name: py-pywcs

description:
This package contains utilities used to package some of STScI's Python
projects.
name: py-stsci-distutils

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
